1420310.name: Quiet Rehabilitation
1420310.description:
"It used to be a high security prison - it's something much worse than that now."

Experience an alternate take on Freeman's journey where Barney isn't at his aid. Thrown into Nova Prospekt, you are assigned to reach the nearest rebel camp with the initial goal to begin the long-awaited Uprising. Battle your way through the prison against the Combine forces and what lies within the ruins of this isolated fortress.

Quiet Rehabilitation is a FREE Half-Life 2 singleplayer modification that focus on to expand and revamp the original 'Nova Prospekt' chapters by bringing brand-new locations, enhancing its storytelling with appealing visuals and highly detailed levels. Following the authentic design seen in the main game.

What to Expect

  • Approximately three hours of overall playtime.

  • Fight for your freedom through five chapters of prisonbreak.

  • A full exploration of places within Nova Prospekt never seen before.

  • Refined puzzles and well-crafted levels, respecting the original design.

  • Packed with vanilla combat with the HEV suit that you know and love.

  • Developer commentary and the mod's source files included.

Special thanks to those who have played previous Quiet Rehabilitation and Mutual Place.
